description: Try our easy to follow Salmon With Blueberry, Avocado And Lime Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salmon With Blueberry, Avocado And Lime Salsa
name: Salmon With Blueberry, Avocado And Lime Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix lime juice and soy sauce together and drizzle over salad. Garnish with chilli and serve with lime wedges.
